title: Looks like Kogmaw is the next freelo adc
body: I literally played some ranked games today, and all the ones with {{champion:96}} instantly got fed and technically carried the entire game. Not to mention, that little larva's team recognized that he was the one carrying them, so they all peeled his ass. Now we all know a fed kogmaw is one of the scariest things in the game. I guess that in this tank meta, we may see more of kogmaw last in this season.
